entry.en:
Spear-phial containing Plasmium.

Injecting the liquid allows one to gain health beyond their natural limits.
entry.zh:
装载生质液的注射瓶。

注入液体可突破自然极限恢复生命。

entry.en:
Brace of surgical pins from the Whiteward. Used to forcefully insert Silk deep inside a bug’s shell.

Increases the speed of binding.
entry.zh:
白愈厅的外科针组，用于将灵丝强制注入甲壳深层。

加快缚丝速度。

entry.en: Transform Tools while resting at a bench.
entry.zh: 在长椅休息时转换工具。

entry.en:
Hooked tool for the forceful retrieval of loot from bugs and husks.

Harpoon into foes to steal rosaries and shell shards, while causing additional damage.
entry.zh:
从虫尸强行夺取战利品的钩具。

刺入敌人窃取念珠与甲壳碎片并造成额外伤害。

entry.en:
Vicious bracelet worn by those who believe they have not been duly punished.

Increases damage taken, but also increases damage dealt by the needle.
entry.zh:
自认刑罚不足者佩戴的刑器。

增加承受伤害，同时提升织针伤害。

entry.en: Stalk prey and attack with lethal strikes.
Equip Tools while resting at a bench.
entry.zh: 在长椅休息时装备工具。

entry.en:
Flexible belt of serrated metal teeth, able to affixed to the hem of a cloak.

Flaring the cloak will spin the blades, damaging surrounding enemies.
entry.zh:
可固定于披风边缘的锯齿金属带。

挥动披风会旋转利刃伤害周围敌人。

entry.en:
Short pins designed to be scattered along the ground.

The sharp points will pierce any enemy who steps upon them.
entry.zh:
设计用于撒布地面的短钉。

尖锐钉头会刺伤踩踏的敌人。

entry.en:
Twin theatrical tools of a vainglorious bug.

When binding, emits a searing blast that damages surrounding enemies.
entry.zh:
虚荣虫的双生戏剧道具。

当缚丝时释放灼热冲击伤害周围敌人

entry.en: Stalk prey and attack with lethal strikes. Build focus with successive strikes.
entry.zh: 潜行猎杀，致命打击。连续攻击可积蓄专注。

entry.en:
Spiral weapon fashioned from a hardened conchspire.

Thrown at an angle, it can ricochet and catch prey off guard.
entry.zh:
硬化螺角打造的螺旋武器。

倾斜投掷可回弹突袭目标。

entry.en:
Playthings carved from magnetic material.

Used in simple games and believed to bring luck to the bearer.
entry.zh:
磁性材料雕刻的赌具。

用于简单游戏，据说能为持有者带来好运。

entry.en: Weighted pin and haft, formed to pierce tough shells.
entry.zh: 加重的穿刺长针，用于穿透坚硬甲壳。

entry.en: Light throwing tool, designed for rapid attacks.
entry.zh: 轻型投掷武器，适合快速连击。

entry.en:
Empty spear-phial for injecting Plasmium.

Acquire more Plasmium to restore the tool.
entry.zh:
空的生质液注射瓶。

需获取更多生质液补充。

entry.en:
Quick access container formed from an old shell.

Increases the quantity of crafted tools.
entry.zh:
旧甲壳改造的速取容器。

增加可携带制作工具数量。

entry.en: Equip additional Tools, independent of one’s Crest.
entry.zh: 可独立于当前纹章装备额外工具

entry.en:
Trap-setting tool of the Weavers. Lays a Silk rune that ignites when foes come into contact.

Uses shell canisters and the wielder’s own Silk.
entry.zh:
织者布置陷阱的工具，铺设接触触发的灵丝符文。

需消耗甲壳罐与使用者的灵丝。

entry.en:
Amulet of protection formed from Mossberries.

As the bearer takes damage, the amulet weeps a green elixir that will form into Silk.
entry.zh:
苔莓制成的护身符。

持有者受伤时，护符会渗出可转化为灵丝的绿液。

entry.en:
Invigorating beverage prepared by the Flea Caravan.

Temporarily increases the speed of movement and attacks.
entry.zh:
跳蚤旅团调制的活力饮品。

暂时提升移动与攻击速度。

entry.en:
Lethal trap formed of tightly bound blades.

Once placed, the trap will pierce enemies that come into contact.
entry.zh:
由密集刀片构成的致命陷阱。

触发后会刺伤接触的敌人。

entry.en: Cut swiftly and nimbly with short, precise strikes.
entry.zh: 以精准、短距攻击进行灵巧切割。

entry.en:
Repurposed mechanism from the base of a rosary stringing machine.

Rosaries must be inserted to reload the cannon.
entry.zh:
念珠串装机底部改造的装置。

需装入念珠进行装填。

entry.en:
Ancient weapon of the Weavers, repaired and modified by Twelfth Architect.

Uses shell canisters and the wielder’s own Silk to fire.
entry.zh:
建筑师修复改造的织者古兵器。

需消耗甲壳罐与使用者的灵丝发射。

entry.en: Whip the needle in sweeping swings. Leech the life of foes through twisted roots.
entry.zh: 扫动织针，通过扭曲根须窃取敌人生命。

entry.en:
Hardened throwing weapon of the warrior Shakra.

Blunt force weapon that rebounds between enemies and hard surfaces.
entry.zh:
战士沙克拉的硬化投掷武器。

在敌人与硬质表面间反弹的钝击武器。

entry.en: Tear foes with savage slashes. Bind to enter a wild fury and steal life from prey.
entry.zh: 野蛮撕裂敌人。缚丝进入狂暴状态并窃取生命。

entry.en:
Reflective stone with mnemonic properties.

When taking damage, a memory of the bearer is formed of crystal. The memory will shatter into sharp spines if an enemy comes into contact.
entry.zh:
具记忆特性的反光石。

受击时生成持有者的水晶记忆，接触敌人会爆裂成尖刺。

entry.en:
Holy stone inscribed with a prayer for rosaries.

Any loose beads will be pulled toward the wearer.
entry.zh:
刻有念珠祷文的圣石。

使散落念珠向佩戴者聚集。

entry.en:
Sophisticated Weaver device. Resonates with music played to amplify and enhance a performance.

Expands and strengthens the effects of the Needolin.
entry.zh:
精密的织者装置，通过音乐共振增强演奏效果。

增强并扩大织忆弦针的效果范围。

entry.en:
Fabric pouch filled with volatile material.

Explodes on impact with enemies or when ignited by its fuse.
entry.zh:
填充易爆材料的织物囊。

撞击敌人或引燃导火索时会爆炸。

entry.en:
Ornate artefact of the Citadel, able to hold a Bind’s worth of Silk. Used when healing is needed and one’s natural resources run low.

The Reserve Bind will be restored when resting at a bench.
entry.zh:
圣堡华美遗器，可储存完整收缚的灵丝。可在自然灵丝枯竭时用于治疗。

在长椅休息时自动恢复。

entry.en:
Forged iron bell, crafted to ward against the intense heat of the Deep Docks.

Reduces the damage taken from flame and magma.
entry.zh:
锻造铁钟，用于抵御深坞酷热。

减少火焰与熔岩伤害。

entry.en:
Rotary tool used for boring into bone and rock.

Drives the wielder downwards, while spinning the drill with destructive force.
entry.zh:
用于穿透骨岩的旋转工具。

驱动使用者向下突进并释放破坏性钻击。

entry.en:
Charged organ from a defeated Voltvyrm.

Can be coiled around thread, imbuing Silk Skills with electric charge.
entry.zh:
击败伏特维姆获取的带电器官。

可缠绕丝线为灵丝技能附加电荷。

entry.en: Change Crests while resting at a bench.
entry.zh: 在长椅休息时更换纹章。

entry.en:
Sharpening slate made from cut and polished Flintgem.

Temporarily super heats the needle’s blade, imbuing each slash with flame and increasing lethality.
entry.zh:
燧晶切割打磨的磨刀石。

暂时使针刃过热，赋予斩击火焰特效。

entry.en:
Ancient weapon of the Weavers, repaired and modified by Forge Daughter.

Uses shell canisters and the wielder’s own Silk to fire.
entry.zh:
熔炉之女修复改造的织者古兵器。

需消耗甲壳罐与使用者的灵丝发射。

entry.en:
Old bug’s skull carved for protection. Shields against critical damage but shatters on impact.

If shattered, the mask will be repaired while resting at a bench.
entry.zh:
老虫头骨雕刻的护具，可抵挡致命伤害但受击即碎。

破损后需在长椅休息时修复。

entry.en:
Pouch containing a fast-acting venom drawn from a flower’s heart.

Applies venom to equipped tools.
entry.zh:
装有花心速效毒液的囊袋。

为装备工具淬毒。

entry.en: Equip Silk Skills while resting at a bench.
entry.zh: 在长椅休息时装备灵丝技能。

entry.en:
Expanding circular blade powered by a cogwork motor.

Propels forward, slicing through foes.
entry.zh:
齿轮驱动的环形利刃。

向前突进切割路径上的敌人。

entry.en:
Theatrical tool of a vainglorious bug.

When binding, emits a dazzling flash that damages surrounding enemies.
entry.zh:
虚荣虫的戏剧道具。

当缚丝时释放炫光伤害周围敌人。

entry.en:
Broken iron lantern containing smouldering wispfire.

Wisps will spawn from the lantern and burn foes, at the cost of Silk.
entry.zh:
装有阴燃灵火的破损铁灯。

消耗灵丝生成灼烧敌人的灵火。

entry.en:
Symbol worn to identify oneself to fellow thieves.

Gain extra rosaries from defeated enemies, but lose some rosaries on taking damage.
entry.zh:
盗贼间识别身份的标记。

击败敌人获得额外念珠，但受伤会损失部分。

entry.en: Cannot use items while in a memory.

Taut-drawing mechanism built from reed and bone, intended for mounting on the limb of a bug.

Doubles the number of tools thrown.
entry.zh:
骨苇制成的紧绷发射机构，可装配于虫肢。

使投掷工具数量翻倍。

entry.en: Winged cogwork companion that will seek nearby foes and attack.
entry.zh: 机械齿轮构成的飞行伙伴，会自动攻击附近敌人。

entry.en:
Elaborate, etched Weaver spindle, usable only by wielders of Silk.

Extends the act of binding, but increases its healing effect.
entry.zh:
刻纹织者纺锤，仅限灵丝使用者操作。

延长缚丝时间但增强治疗效果。

entry.en: Cast the blade forward and strengthen Silk Skills with powerful runes.
entry.zh: 投射利刃，用强力符文增强灵丝技能。

entry.en:
Fragile band woven of reed and leaf, crafted to repel Muckmaggots.

If broken, the wreath will be repaired while resting at a bench.
entry.zh:
芦苇嫩枝编织的驱蛆环。

破损后需在长椅休息时修复。

entry.en:
Fabric pouch packed with unstable powder.

Explodes on impact with enemies or when ignited by its fuse.
entry.zh:
装满不稳定粉末的织物囊。

撞击敌人或引燃导火索时会爆炸。

entry.en:
Discarded purse of a fallen pilgrim.

Allows the bearer to retain some rosaries upon defeat.
entry.zh:
殒命朝圣者遗落的钱包。

使持有者战败时保留部分念珠。

entry.en:
Experimental anklets of Weaver make.

Draws upon the wearer’s own Silk to increase sprinting speed.
entry.zh:
织者制作的实验性脚环。

抽取使用者灵丝提升冲刺速度。

entry.en: Attack with heavy, arcing slashes and reap additional Silk from enemies.
entry.zh: 挥舞重弧斩击，从敌人身上收割额外灵丝。

entry.en:
Holy bell inscribed with a hymn of protection.

Shields the bearer as they bind their wounds.
entry.zh:
刻有守护圣诗的圣钟。

疗伤期间为持有者提供护盾。

entry.en:
Empty flask which once contained an invigorating beverage.

Acquire more Flea Brew to restore the tool.
entry.zh:
曾装有活力饮品的空瓶。

需获取更多跳蚤秘酿补充。

entry.en:
Emblem of the Order of the Pinstress, the old blademasters of Pharloom.

Reduces charge time of Needle Strike.
entry.zh:
纺络地区古针匠组织'针姬教团'的徽记。

缩短蓄力斩的蓄力时间。

entry.en: Radial sharpbone used by skilled hunters to take down dangerous prey.
entry.zh: 高阶猎手使用的放射状锐骨武器，用于猎杀危险猎物。

entry.en:
Equip Tools in the Crest menu
while resting at a bench.
entry.zh: 在长椅休息时，于纹章界面装备工具。

entry.en: Arched sharpbone used by hunters to take down flying prey.
entry.zh: 猎手使用的弧形锐骨武器，用于猎杀飞行目标。

entry.en: Reload Tools while resting at a bench.
entry.zh: 在长椅休息时装填工具。

entry.en:
Intricate tracking device, carved from shell.

When equipped, the bearer’s location will be marked on their map.
entry.zh:
甲壳雕刻的精密追踪装置

装备后可在地图标记持有者位置。

entry.en: To change Crest, open the Crest screen of the Menu while resting at a bench.
entry.zh: 要更换纹章，请在长椅休息时打开纹章界面。

entry.en:
Artificial spine that clasps tight around the shell.

Enhances the wearer’s innate flexibility, allowing rapid retreat.
entry.zh:
紧扣甲壳的金属脊柱。

增强持有者灵活性，实现快速撤离。

entry.en:
Convertible orbs containing electricity.

The vessels can be thrown as a bola for an explosive discharge or staked as a spear to release a column of energy.
entry.zh:
可转换形态的带电球体。

作为流星锤投掷引爆，或作为标枪固定释放能量柱。

entry.en:
Silk-storing tool of the Citadel, fashioned after an artefact of the Weavers.

Allows the storing of additional Silk beyond one’s natural abilities.
entry.zh:
圣堡仿织者遗器制作的储丝装置。

可突破自然限制储存额外灵丝。

entry.en:
Crude trinket worn by collectors and crafters.

Allows one to collect more shell shards from defeated creatures.
entry.zh:
采集者与工匠佩戴的粗制饰品。

击败敌人时可获取更多甲壳碎片。

entry.en: Gilded piton that allows one to hold in place while on a wall.
entry.zh: 镀金岩钉，允许在墙面上固定位置。

entry.en:
Tool designed to extract and store fluids.

To pierce its target, the Needle Phial must first be charged to full tension.
entry.zh:
设计用于提取储存液体的工具。

需蓄满张力才能穿透目标。

entry.en:
Icon of the mythical mother flea, passed down from caravans of old. A symbol of protection and kinship.

Decreases the cost of Silk Skills while health is full.
entry.zh:
旅团传承的传说跳蚤之母圣像，象征庇护与亲缘。

生命值全满时降低灵丝技能消耗。

entry.en:
Gleaming apparatus of Weaver make. Its core emits a faint glow.

Increases the speed of Silk regeneration.
entry.zh:
织者制造的发光装置，核心散发微光。

提升灵丝恢复速度。

entry.en:
Powerful amulet of protection formed from many Mossberries.

As the bearer takes damage, the amulet weeps a green elixir that will form into Silk.
entry.zh:
多重苔莓强化的护身符。

持有者受伤时，护符会渗出可转化为灵丝的绿液。

entry.en: Equip tools for aid in combat or exploration.
entry.zh: 装备工具以辅助战斗或探索。

entry.en:
Heavy band favoured by those with an unsteady step.

The wearer will recoil less when striking foes and will not be flung as far when taking damage.
entry.zh:
步履不稳者偏好的重环。

攻击和受击时不易后退。

entry.en:
Talisman fashioned from the talon of a large predator.

Increases the range of needle attacks.
entry.zh:
大型掠食者利爪制成的护符。

增加织针攻击范围。

entry.en:
Shattered flask which once contained an invigorating beverage.

Acquire more Flea Brew to restore the tool.
entry.zh:
曾装有活力饮品的破碎瓶。

需获取更多跳蚤秘酿补充。

entry.en:
Ancient weapon of the Weavers, repaired to its original form.

Uses shell canisters and the wielder’s own Silk to fire.
entry.zh:
修复至原始形态的织者古兵器。

需消耗甲壳罐与使用者的灵丝发射。

entry.en: Spin the needle as a screw, shredding foes. Spend Silk to rapidly craft new tools.
entry.zh: 旋转织针撕裂敌人。消耗灵丝快速制作新工具。

entry.en: Flat, layered weapon, crafted to be thrown in a set.
entry.zh: 分层扁平武器，可成套投掷。
